string-array.name: on_boarding_texts
string-array.item: Welcome to your shortcut for standout resumes and coverletters.
Easily create professional resumes and cover letters with AI. Our smart system highlights your strengths and fit job descriptions.
The job advertisement you are replying to tells you exactly what the employer is looking for in a candidate.
"Unless you're a high level executive or scholar, your resume should be one page long"
